content: materials our sunday dinner dishtowels bundle 1 has enough yarn for all three dishtowels it includes… - yarn a 2 skeins of purl soho s santolina 2 70% organically grown cotton 20% rayon from bamboo and 10% hemp each skein is approximately 328 yards/ 100 grams approximately 650 yards required - yarn b 1 skein of purl soho s sweetgrass 3 65% organic cotton and 35% superfine alpaca undyed each skein is approximately 437 yards/ 100 grams approximately 60 yards required we used the pewter blue + rye flour palette for our samples you ll also need… - us 6 4 mm 16-inch or longer circular needles 4 gauge 28 stitches and 52 row = 4 inches in linen stitch size finished dimensions approximately 11 inches wide x 17½ inches long designed for purl soho by catherine li-abrams 5 based in toronto catherine is a photographer and longtime-knitter-turned-knitwear-designer she seeks and creates beauty in the world around her especially through her love of yarn and knitting all images ©️ copyright purl soho 1 https //www purlsoho com/sunday-dinner-dishtowels-bundle html 2 https //www purlsoho com/santolina html 3 https //www purlsoho com/sweetgrass html 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=881 5 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/catherine-li-abrams-ravelry-store
